uk.co.optimisticpanda.gtest.dto
Interface IDataEditor<D>

Type Parameters:
D - The type of dto that this will edit.
All Known Implementing Classes:
MappedClassDataEditor, SimpleDataEditor
public interface IDataEditor<D>

An editor that applies one or more rules to a list of dtos.

Author:
Andy Lee

Method Summary
 void edit(int index, D dataItem)
          Apply one or more rules with a user specified index.
 void edit(java.util.List<D> testData)
          Apply one or more rules to a list of dtos.
 

Method Detail

edit

void edit(java.util.List<D> testData)
Apply one or more rules to a list of dtos.

Parameters:
testData - The list of dtos to edit.

edit

void edit(int index,
          D dataItem)
Apply one or more rules with a user specified index.

Parameters:
index - This is used by some IRules to distinguish between different dtos in the same list. For instance, rules which contain EvenOddCondition.ODD will fire if the index is odd and IncrementingNameEdit will append the index to the end of a predefined base string.
dataItem - the dto to apply the rule(s) to.
